text: ai eemaan vaalon apanee paak kamaee aur un cheezon mein se jo hamane tumhaare lie zameen se paida kee hain (khuda kee raah mein) kharch karo aur bure maal ko (khuda kee raah mein) dene ka qasad bhee na karo haaloki agar aisa maal koee tumako dena chaahe to tum apanee khushee se usake lene vaale nahin ho magar ye ki us (ke lene) mein (amadan) aankh churao aur jaane raho ki khuda beshak beniyaaz (aur) sazaavaare hamd hai
